price: Dan engkau (Musa) telah melakukan (kesalahan dari) perbuatan yang telah engkau lakukan585) dan engkau termasuk orang yang tidak tahu berterima kasih."
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: *585) Perbuatan Nabi Musa -'alaihissalām- membunuh orang Qibṭi. Lihat Al-Qaṣaṣ (28): 15.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
